tool_description: Connect & Control Electric Vehicle Chargers from your application
name: eDRV EV Charging
title: eDRV EV Charging

api_list.name: getChargeStationConnectors
api_list.description: Get Connectors data filtered by ChargeStation

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ChargeStation id that connectors need to be fetched for

api_list.name: getChargeStation
api_list.description: Use to request a single charge station's data

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The charge station id that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getConnector

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of Connector that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getRealtime
api_list.description: Use to request a Websockets handshake
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com/v1/realtime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "edrv-ev-charging.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getChargeStations

optional_parameters.name: active
optional_parameters.description: Chargestations that have been activated/deactivated by the admin

api_list.name: getOrganization
api_list.description: Get one organization data by id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of organization that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getStat
api_list.description: Get statistics for an activity for an asset within a certain date

required_parameters.name: asset
required_parameters.description: The asset you would like to get stats for.

api_list.name: getDriver
api_list.description: Use to request a single driver

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The driver id that needs to be fetched

api_list.name: getTransaction

optional_parameters.name: driver
optional_parameters.description: Return Driver Info based on Identification Method used for this transaction

api_list.name: getTransactions

optional_parameters.name: onlyActive
optional_parameters.description: True to get only active transactions

optional_parameters.name: sortAscending
optional_parameters.description: True to sort ascending (default is false - descending)
